attributes.action: Put politics aside and agree a fair and permanent funding formula for our NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
The constant bickering around the NHS in politics is tiring. All major parties say they are committed to the NHS, so let’s agree a fair funding formula giving a permanent, predictable funding for the NHS..
I call on the government to then take politics out of the service, not allow it to be used as a political football and hand it over to managers and health professionals to run our National Health Service for the benefit of the people.
attributes.background:
I want our political parties to come together and agree a fair and permanent funding formula for our NHS.
Once agreed, I would like politicians to take a back seat and allow health professionals to run and manage the NHS.
